3 NAVIGATINGState::NAVIGATINGState(float x, float y, float yaw, ros::NodeHandle node) : move_base_clt_("move_base", false)
4 {
5  current_goal_.x = x;
6  current_goal_.y = y;
7  current_goal_.yaw = yaw;
8  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN State Machine] New goal set to x=%f, y=%f, yaw=%f", x, y, yaw);
9  node_ = node;
10  move_base_cancel_pub_ = node_.advertise<actionlib_msgs::GoalID>("/move_base/cancel", 0);
11  state_identifier_ = STATE_NAVIGATING;
12 }

19 int NAVIGATINGState::sendGoal(Goal new_goal)
20 {
21  int attempts = 0;
22  try
23  {
24  float check_input = boost::lexical_cast<float>(new_goal.x);
25  }
26  catch (boost::bad_lexical_cast &e)
27  {
28  ROS_INFO("%s", e.what());
29  ROS_ERROR("[Unicorn State Machine] x is undefined");
30  return -1;
31  }
32  try
33  {
34  float check_input = boost::lexical_cast<float>(new_goal.y);
35  }
36  catch (boost::bad_lexical_cast &)
37  {
38  ROS_ERROR("[Unicorn State Machine] y is undefined");
39  return -1;
40  }
41  try
42  {
43  float check_input = boost::lexical_cast<float>(new_goal.yaw);
44  }
45  catch (boost::bad_lexical_cast &)
46  {
47  ROS_ERROR("[Unicorn State Machine] yaw is undefined");
48  return -1;
49  }
50  while (!move_base_clt_.waitForServer(ros::Duration(5.0)) && (attempts < 4))
51  {
52  ROS_INFO("Waiting for the move_base action server to come up");
53  attempts++;
54  }
55  if(attempts == 3)
56  {
57  ROS_WARN("Failed to contact move base server after four attempts, goal not published!");
58  return -1;
59  }
60 
61  move_base_msgs::MoveBaseGoal goal;
62  goal.target_pose.header.frame_id = "map";
63  goal.target_pose.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
64  goal.target_pose.pose.position.x = new_goal.x;
65  goal.target_pose.pose.position.y = new_goal.y;
66  goal.target_pose.pose.orientation = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromYaw(new_goal.yaw);
67 
68  move_base_clt_.sendGoal(goal);
69 
70  return 1;
71 }
72 
73 void NAVIGATINGState::cancelGoal()
74 {
75  actionlib_msgs::GoalID cancel_all;
76  move_base_cancel_pub_.publish(cancel_all);
77  ROS_INFO("[Unicorn State Machine] Canceling move_base goal");
78 }
79 
80 Command NAVIGATINGState::run()
81 {
82  Command new_cmd;
83  new_cmd.state = STATE_IDLE;
84  int err = sendGoal(current_goal_);
85  if(err == -1)
86  {
87  ROS_ERROR("[Unicorn State Machine] Could not send goal. Entering IDLE state.");
88  return new_cmd;
89  }
90  ros::Rate rate(50);
91 
92  while (true)
93  {
94  ros::spinOnce();
95  if(command.state != -1)
96  {
97  cancelGoal();
98  ROS_INFO("[Unicorn State Machine] New command was issued, halting navigation.");
99  return command;
100  }
101  if(move_base_clt_.getState() == actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState::SUCCEEDED)
102  {
103  ROS_INFO("[Unicorn State Machine] Robot reached designated goal!");
104  break;
105  }
106  rate.sleep();
107  }
108  return new_cmd;
109 }
